element.definition: How likely is the outcome (in the specified timeframe).
element.comments: If range is used, it represents the lower and upper bounds of certainty; e.g. 40-60%  Decimal values are expressed as percentages as well (max = 100).

constraint.human: low and high must be percentages, if present
constraint.xpath: (not(f:low) or f:low[f:code/@value='%' and f:system/@value='http://unitsofmeasure.org']) and (not(f:high) or f:high[f:code/@value='%' and f:system/@value='http://unitsofmeasure.org'])

binding.description: The likelihood of the occurrence of a specified outcome
